name: 19115-4 DQC
description:
## Refactoring to use standard building blocks

Working draft of 19115-4 JSON encoding.

Examples provided by WG - schema generated by Shapechange ?
annotatedSchema:
$comment: JSON Schema document created by ShapeChange - https://shapechange.net/
$schema: https://json-schema.org/draft/2020-12/schema
$id: http://standards.iso.org/iso/19157-1/-/dqc/dqc.json
$defs:
  missing:
    type: string
    description: missing ref in schema
  MD_Identifier:
    type: string
    description: placeholder for circular dependency
  MD_Scope:
    type: string
    description: placeholder for circular dependency
  CI_Citation:
    type: string
    description: placeholder for circular dependency
  AbsolutePositionalAccuracy:
    $anchor: AbsolutePositionalAccuracy
    type: object
    properties:
      properties:
        type: object

            type: string
          measure:

          result-ConformanceResult:

            items:

            uniqueItems: true
          result-DescriptiveResult:

            uniqueItems: true
          result-QuantitativeResult:

            uniqueItems: true
          derivedElement-Commission:
            type: array
            items:

            uniqueItems: true
          derivedElement-Confidence:
            type: array
            items:
              $ref: '#/$defs/Confidence'
            uniqueItems: true

            uniqueItems: true

            uniqueItems: true

            uniqueItems: true
          evaluationMethod-FullInspection:
            type: array
            items:

            uniqueItems: true
          evaluationMethod-IndirectEvaluation:
            type: array
            items:
              $ref: '#/$defs/IndirectEvaluation'
            uniqueItems: true
        required:
        - '@type'
        - measure
    required:
    - properties
  AggregationDerivation:
    $anchor: AggregationDerivation
    type: object
    properties:

        required:

    required:

            uniqueItems: true
